oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Study of Re-garnets using BPW method
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: GOVEAS, N
MUKHOPADHYAY, P
MMUKHOPADHYAY, G
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The magnetic susceptibility of rare-earth (Y and Lu) iron garnets is studied using a modified Bethe-Peierls-Weiss (BPW) approximation. The modifications enable us to incorporate the three exchange parameters J(ad), J(aa) and J(dd) necessary to describe the systems. We get excellent fits to the experimental susceptibilities from which we determined the J-values. These also give excellent agreement with the spin wave dispersion relation constant D.
